message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $150 is too low for me. How about $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $140 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
